tag_list: iphone, ipad, social, technology, php, mysql, web-development, email-marketing, video
overview:
Ron Bentata is technology and internet fan boy. An internet & mobile entrepreneur looking for inspiring ideas.

As the year 2000 came and left the passing millennium behind, so did Ron, leaving his youth, stepping out into the cruel, yet warm internet world.

At first Ron was delivering website development services to a handful few, among them Edith.co.il, a lingerie e-commerce website.

In 2006 Ron co-founded inManage.co.il to deliver Web Development services to small and medium businesses. During that time he also graduated his BA degree in Business Management and Marketing.

In 2009 he founded and operated iMob.co.il as an iPhone Apps Development service. Ron also developed Navi Arnavi (navi.co.il) which delivered iphone apps and games targeted to children.

During 2010, Ron co-founded Astrolome.com with his partners with the goal of delivering personal and accurate personal astrology.

In the late 2011, Ron co-founded JongouApps.com, while taking the position of CTO and VP R&D. JongouApps is delivering a centralized smart cms for business, while giving them the power to simply manage their digital presence and e-commerce on multiple channels (web, mobile, social networks, tv etc.).

And the rest, as they say, is history… (or future)

Ron is also a TED.com follower and translator as he loves creative and smart solutions - “don’t imitate, innovate”.

In the evenings, unless he really don’t have the time for it, you can find Ron keeping in shape, in the gym or just jogging.
